description: Applied causal machine learning and statistical analysis within a DAG-based framework to evaluate the effect of treatment (scholarship) on the outcome (student dropout). Built with Python, scikit-learn, pandas (model), and Django + Django REST Framework (backend & API). Ideal as a small end-to-end demo for healthcare/ML portfolios.

Flask is a lightweight, open-source Python web framework used in Data Science to deploy and manage data-driven applications. It offers a simple yet powerful structure for creating web apps and APIs that integrate with data analysis or machine learning models, providing flexibility for custom solutions.

This project develops machine learning models to predict key performance properties of carbon-ceramic composites, including thermal conductivity, mechanical strength, and oxidation resistance. By analyzing composition and processing parameters, we enable optimized material design and quality control for advanced ceramic manufacturing.

This project focuses on developing an optimized multi-model fusion approach to enhance the accuracy of lung cancer prediction using machine learning and deep learning techniques. By combining multiple models and optimizing their performance, the system aims to provide a more reliable and robust prediction framework for early lung cancer detection.

This project develops neural-network surrogate models for fast, accurate European option pricing under stochastic volatility frameworks. Traditional methods like Monte Carlo simulations are computationally expensive. The goal is to use machine learning models, trained on synthetic data, for orders-of-magnitude faster pricing with similar accuracy.
Minerva is a framework for training machine learning models for researchers.

TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides strong support for various platforms, especially Linux, and is widely adopted in the industry due to its active community and production-ready capabilities.

Tywra ML is a front-end machine learning website built using the React.js library and the Next.js framework. This website was created as a simple project while also continuing advanced learning of JavaScript.

This project focuses on building a multi-model ransomware detection framework using both classical Machine Learning (ML) and **Deep Learning (DL) techniques. The framework supports the integration of Reward Machines (RMs), providing a modular and flexible structure for defining complex tasks.

Machine learning framework for aging analysis in Drosophila single-cell RNA-seq   data. Deep learning models with SHAP interpretability, batch correction, and   comprehensive research workflows.

This project is a Spam Email Classifier developed using the Naive Bayes algorithm implemented in Java with the Weka machine learning framework. It aims to identify and classify emails as spam or non-spam based on text features. Programming Language: Java  Machine Learning Library: Weka  Dataset: UCI Spambase.

This project Predicts plant health using NDVI values, classifying leaves as Healthy, Unhealthy, or Dead. NDVI drives prediction, while OpenCV showcases image color and edges, and CNN (MobileNetV2) extracts features for visualization. Includes EDA plots for NDVI distribution and category analysis in a concise, educational framework.

This repository serves as a curated portfolio of my Machine Learning work, featuring well-documented implementations, experiments with datasets, and analyses using modern frameworks. Designed to reflect both theoretical understanding and hands-on proficiency.

Smart Flight Booking App is an intelligent flight reservation platform built with React.js and Django REST Framework that uses machine learning for price prediction, enabling users to seamlessly search, compare, and book flights through a secure, responsive, and visually appealing interface.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.
Data Science & Machine Learning projects including time series forecasting, image classification, and text summarization using modern ML frameworks.

AI-VAPT is an autonomous, AI-driven Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT) framework designed to revolutionize cybersecurity testing. The platform combines traditional manual VAPT methodologies with neural intelligence, machine learning, and intelligent automation. It supports continuous, scalable, and context-aware vulnerability.

End-to-end implementations of modern Artificial Intelligence systems  spanning classical machine learning, deep neural networks, generative models, and agentic architectures. Built with industry-grade frameworks and designed for scalable experimentation, and real-world deployment across data-driven applications.
A machine learning project that predicts visa approval status using applicant data. Built using Python, scikit-learn following the CRISP-DM framework.

This project implements a Supervised Machine Learning (ML) framework to accurately predict the cost of an Electric Vehicle (EV) based on its key features and specifications. This is fundamentally a regression problem, aiming to determine a continuous value (price) from a set of input variables (features).

ShapeShift is a hybrid physics-informed machine learning framework for efficient mechanical simulation of MEX 3D-printed parts. It transforms computationally expensive filament-level finite element models into fast and accurate solid surrogate models.

This project is an **advanced multi-stage Bitcoin ECDSA signature analyzer and recovery system**.   It integrates **machine learning (XGBoost, LSTM, GAN)**, **reinforcement learning (Gym)**, and **genetic algorithms**   to automatically detect weak or reused nonces across blockchain transactions and attempt secure key reconstruction.

Explainable AI insider threat detection system with 100% precision. Isolation Forest + SHAP framework processing 26.2GB multi-modal behavioral data (CERT/TWOS datasets). Designed for SOC analyst workflow integration.

A Hybrid QuantumMachine Learning Framework for precision farming that integrates Random Forest, XGBoost, and Qiskit-based Quantum models to predict crop yield and profitability, enabling data-driven decisions for sustainable agriculture using Streamlit.
A minimal library for accessible Machine Learning workflows within the KDD framework. You can use a MLwrap tutorial at: https://psyarxiv.com/j6m4z

SMILE is a featurebased machine learning classification framework for eventinterval sequence data. While its primary application is medical diagnostics using Electronic Health Record data, the framework is generalisable to domains such as human activity recognition, music classification, and manufacturing telemetry.

My goal is to build a strong foundation in AI/ML by experimenting, learning, and sharing my progress with the community.
